item.description:
This event open to all Kayak types as well as canoes

Enjoy an afternoon of paddling the slow moving Merrimack River from Concord NH. We'll launch at the boat ramp located adjacent to the ball field at New Hampshire Technical College. Be sure to bring lunch or snacks as well as water or other beverages as this event will last 3+ hours.

Directions:
Take Route 93 North through the toll.
Take Exit 15E off 93 onto Rt 393/202/4
Then take Exit 1 - Fort Eddy Road
Take left off Exit towards New Hampshire Technical Institute NHTI
Take right on dirt road just before the Ballfields.
Put in is at the boat ramp.

Life Vests aka PFDs must be worn at all time when paddling with this group

Google Maps Directions to Launch Site on College Drive.
item.name: Merrimack River North of Concord NH Paddle
